Name.BusinessNameLine1: MICHAEL-ANN RUSSELL JEWISH COMMUNITY CENTER INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE MARJCC IS DEDICATED TO THE ENRICHMENT OF JEWISH LIFE AND FOSTERS THE SPIRITUAL, EMOTIONAL, AND PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENT OF ITS MEMBERS THROUGH ALL OF LIFE'S STAGES AND CIRCUMSTANCES.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE MARJCC IS DEDICATED TO THE ENRICHMENT OF JEWISH LIFE AND FOSTERS THE SPIRITUAL, EMOTIONAL, AND PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENT OF ITS MEMBERS THROUGH ALL OF LIFE'S STAGES AND CIRCUMSTANCES.
IRS990.Description: SEE SCHEDULE 0COMMUNITY SERVICES - MIAMI: THE MARJCC PROVIDES THE NORTH MIAMI BEACH COMMUNITY WITH AN ARRAY OF FITNESS PROGRAMS WHICH INCLUDE THE YOUTH FITNESS PROGRAM, THE SENIOR FITNESS PROGRAM, PERSONAL TRAINING, ADULT FITNESS CLASSES, AQUATICS PROGRAM, BASKETBALL PROGRAM, SOCCER PROGRAM, GYMNASTICS PROGRAM, FLAG FOOTBAL PROGRAM , AND TENNIS PROGRAM. FOR EACH ONE OF THESE PROGRAMS THE MARJCC PROVIDES CERTIFIED TRAINERS AND INSTRUCTORS TO PROPERLY GIVE THE YOUTH AND ADULTS WITHIN THE COMMUNITY THE KNOWLEDGE, MOTIVATION, AND TOOLS TO REACHING THEIR OWN INDIVIDUAL FITNESS GOALS. THE MARJCC ALSO PROVIDES THE COMMINUTY WITH VARIOUS ADULT AND YOUTH SPORTS LEAGUES IN AN ATTEMPT TO TEACH POSITIVE VALUES WITH EXCELLENCE, ADHERING TO THE PRINCIPLES OF PASSION FOR THEIR SPORT, DISCIPLINE, TEAMWORK, RESPECT, RESPONSIBILITY, PERSERVERANCE, COURAGE, AND CREATIVITY. EACH ATHLETIC PROGRAM WILL INCLUDE TEAM AND FAMILY COMPONENTS SUCH AS FIELD TRIPS, EVENTS, SPECIAL TOURNAMENTS, AND LECTURES, AMONG OTHERS.

Activity2.Description: SUMMER CAMP: THE CENTER PROVIDES SUMMER ACTIVITIES FOR CHILDREN FROM 2 1/2 YEARS OLD TO 10TH GRADE. THE SUMMER CAMP IS DEDICATED TO DEVELOPING A JEWISH IDENTITY IN THE CAMPERS AND PROMOTING CONTEMPORARY JEWISH LIFE AND THE LOVE OF THE STATE OF ISRAEL. JEWISH THEMES ARE INCORPORATED WITHIN WEEKLY PROGRAMMING THROUGH ARTS AND CRAFTS, JUDAIC PROGRAMMING, MUSIC, DANCE, AND KABBALAT SHABBAT.

Activity3.Description: HEBRAICA: THE MISSION STATEMENT OF THE HEBRAICA YOUTH & LEADERDSHIP PROGRAM IS TO EMPHASIZE THE IMPORTANCE OF PROMOTING JEWISH IDENTITY, JEWISH VALUES, A LOVE FOR ISRAEL, AND THE IMPORTANCE OF FAMILY AND COMMUNITY. THE HEBRAICA PROGRAM WAS CREATED TO MAINTAIN CULTURAL, RELIGIOUS, AND SOCIAL TIES. THE HEBRAICA PROGRAM REACHES OUT TO ALL SEGMENTS OF THE DIVERSE JEWISH COMMUNITY BY PROVIDING VARIOUS PROGRAMS.

ActivityOther.Description: THE CENTER ALSO PROVIDES DAYCARE/PRESCHOOL SERVICES FOR INFANTS AND FOR CHILDREN UP TO THE AGE OF 5. THE CENTER ALSO PROVIDES OTHER NUMEROUS ACTIVITIES, MOSTLY FOR SENIOR CITIZENS SUCH AS SEMINARS, HEALTH SUPPORT, FIELD TRIPS, ETC.

OtherAssets.Description: ALLOCATION DUE FROM GREATER MIAMI JEWISH FEDERATION

OtherLiabilities.Description: DUE TO GREATER MIAMI JEWISH FEDERATION, INC.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: PART V, LINE 4: THE INTENDED USE OF THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO PROVIDE THE ORGANIZATION'S PROGRAMS WITH A PREDICTABLE STREAM OF FUNDING WHILE SEEKING TO MAINTAIN THE PURCHASING POWER OF THE ENDOWMENT ASSETS.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1: COLORADO EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL FACILITIES AUTHORITY

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: REFINANCING OUTSTANDING DEBT AND FINANCING CAPITAL IMPROVEMENTS TO FACILITY

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: JEFFREY SCHECK (PRESIDENT) HAS A DIRECT FAMILY RELATIONSHIP WITH OTHER BOARD MEMBERS AS FOLLOWS: MICHAEL SCHECK, ADRIENNE SCHECK, AND ELISE SCHECK BONWITT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 IS SENT OT THE ORGANIZATION'S MANAGEMENT FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL. THE GOVERNING BODY REVIEWS THE 990 FOR ACCURACY AND COMPLETENESS, AND REVIEWS THE NUMBERS AGAINST THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS MONITORED AND ENFORCED BY THE GOVERNING BODY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION FOR TOP MANAGEMENT AND OTHER EMPLOYEES INCLUDES OBTAINING COMPARABILITY DATA FROM THE JCCA NATIONAL ORGANIZATION. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION IS ALSO REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. A PERSON MAY CALL OR MAIL THE ORGANIZATION THEIR REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS ASSIGNED THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND MANAGEMENT WITH THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT.
